metas.description: All the betting and race information for the 2015 Ryanair chase at the Cheltenham Festival.

page.content:
Cheltenham Festival Day 3 - Ryanair Chase Odds

The Ryanair Chase shares top billing on day 3 with the Ladbrokes World Hurdle and it deservers that lofty billing if the past couple of years are anything to go by, we have seen Imperial Commander claim the Ryanair in 2008 followed by Albertas Run, Riverside Theatre and most recently, Cue Card in 2013. Imperial Commander in particular is a noteworthy winner of the race having returned to the Festival the following year to win the Gold Cup.

Ryanair Chase Betting

14:40 Ryanair Chase (Registered As The Festival Trophy Chase) (Grade 1)
1.Uxizandre - A King - AP McCoy - 16/1
2.Ma Filleule - N Henderson - B Geraghty - 5/1
3.Don Cossack - G Elliott - B Cooper - 5/2f
14 Ran#

Ryanair Chase Result 2014

14:40 Ryanair Chase (Registered As The Festival Trophy Chase) (Grade 1)
1.Dynaste - D Pipe - T Scudamore - 3/1F
2.Hidden Cyclone - JJ Hanlon - A McNamara - 10/1
3.Rajdhani Express - N Henderson - Mr S Waley-Cohen - 18/1
11 Ran

2012 Result

14:40 Ryanair Chase (Registered As The Festival Trophy Chase) (Grade 1) (Class 1, 2m 5f)
1. Riverside Theatre (B J Geraghty) 7/2Fav
2. Albertas Run (A P McCoy) 10/1
3. Medermit (R Thornton) 8/1
12 Ran
